title: Competency Development Strategies in Service Multi-Organizations: Exploring Social Capital and Knowledge Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Students engage in simulation activities with culturally diverse team members, using personal devices (BYOD) to experience online surveys and data analysis.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the role of social capital (structural/relational) within teams with diverse cultural differences.
Learners can present, through case analysis, the impact of knowledge learning types (utilitarian vs. exploratory) on organizational capability development.
Learners can visualize and interpret survey data using simple structural equation modeling tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
